publicationStmt.publisher: COST Action "Distant Reading for European Literary History" (CA16204)

encodingDesc.p: Encoding to ELTeC level 2. Tokenisation, sentence segmentation, morphosyntactic tagging and lemmatisation performed with UDPipe using the romanian-nonstandard-ud-2.6-200830 model. The source was a somewhat modified version of the level 1 files.

revisionDesc.change: Fixed lower case ț and ș in upper-case contexts
Fixed gap attributes, replaced '-1' with '-l' and [-'] when used for contractions with '-'
Converted by checchUp script for new release
Converted by checchUp script for new release
